job.title: Junior Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
About the Role
Veritonic is looking to hire a Jr. Machine Learning Engineer who will play a significant role in continuing to advance our understanding of the human response to audio.
The ideal candidate will have proficiency with deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow and/or Pytorch. Exposure to building deep learning based systems and experience with the full machine learning development cycle (data study, model creation, training, testing, deployment, and monitoring).
About Veritonic
Veritonic is a technology company focused on improving the way brands use audio as part of their marketing strategy – from sonic branding and podcast advertising to smart speaker experiences and social audio. Brands use Veritonic analytics to know that their audio marketing resonates with consumers.
Veritonic is 6 years old and operating in a fast-paced market, headquartered in New York City with employees in Denver, Phoenix, San Francisco, and London. Our most recent funding round was in August 2020 and included Greycroft, Lerer Hippeau and Audible.
Veritonic is an equal opportunities employer. We seek a diverse range of candidates, from all backgrounds, to foster a culture of inclusivity, mutual respect, creativity, and fun. We hire based on merit and qualifications for open positions, and do not discriminate against employees or applicants on any basis. Being true to these values is the only way, we believe, to create a truly winning team and organization.
Key Responsibilities
Study and transform Audio and Textual data to design ML systems
Research and implement deep learning systems
Build ML Pipeline for Audio and Text data
About You
Proficiency with deep learning frameworks (TF/Pytorch)
Experience building deep learning based system
Experience in the full ML development cycle (Data Study, Model Creation, Training, Testing, Deployment, Monitoring)
What We Offer
By joining Veritonic, you will be part of an early stage, creative and dynamic company undergoing rapid growth and transformation into a global market leader:
Competitive salary and bonus plans
Medical, Dental, & Vision benefits
Equity compensation
All the computer gear you need to improve your productivity
Flexible working
